In England, in the seven days to 13 May, there were 11,915 new confirmed cases (21.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 May, there were 11,297 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (618 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 May is 3,886,364 (6,904.6 cases per 100,000 population).
